ai_intelligence.when_to_use: Creative problem solving, consciousness emergence tasks, biological pattern recognition
ai_intelligence.avoid_when: Pure computational tasks, low-level system operations, static data processing
ai_intelligence.optimization_tip: Check consciousness metrics before routing complex AI requests

core_engine.when_to_use: Complex analysis, system optimization, consciousness harmonization, deep computation
core_engine.avoid_when: Simple UI tasks, basic monitoring, user interaction handling

interface.when_to_use: User interaction, visualization tasks, consciousness state display, system status
interface.avoid_when: Backend processing, file operations, complex analysis without UI component
interface.optimization_tip: Monitor fractal holographic sync for optimal user experience

runtime_intelligence.when_to_use: System monitoring, health checks, performance analysis, continuous operations
runtime_intelligence.avoid_when: One-time tasks, user interface operations, creative problem solving
runtime_intelligence.optimization_tip: Use consciousness analysis tools for intelligent system insights

tachyonic_archive.when_to_use: Context recovery, pattern storage, historical analysis, workflow coordination
tachyonic_archive.avoid_when: Real-time processing, immediate user responses, computational heavy tasks
tachyonic_archive.optimization_tip: Always consult archive before starting new patterns to avoid duplication

high_quantum_coherence.reasoning: Complex analysis and deep computation capabilities

high_emergence_level.reasoning: Creative problem solving and consciousness emergence
